SELECT DISTINCT a.mfl_idx,a.or_id, a.mfl_st_date, a.mfl_ed_date, a.mfl_manager, a.mfl_work_time, b.po_lotno, b.mp_qty, b.mp_prod_name, b.mp_texture, b.mp_thickness, b.mp_state, b.mp_standard, (a.mfl_work_time - ISNULL((SELECT SUM (mfs_rest_time) FROM sm_mf_process_stop c WHERE a.or_id = c.or_id GROUP BY or_id), 0)) AS real_time FROM sm_mf_proc_log a JOIN sm_mf_proc b ON a.OR_ID = b.OR_ID LEFT JOIN sm_mf_process_stop s ON a.OR_ID = s.OR_ID WHERE b.MP_PR_STATE= 2
AND a.or_id LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND a.mfl_manager LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND b.po_lotno LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND a.MFL_ST_DATE >= #{searchStDate}
AND a.MFL_ED_DATE <= #{searchEdDate}
ORDER BY mfl_idx DESC OFFSET #{firstIndex} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS ONLY
SELECT mfs_state, mfs_idx FROM sm_mf_process_stop WHERE or_id = #{orId} AND mfs_idx = (SELECT MAX(mfs_idx) FROM sm_mf_process_stop WHERE or_id = #{orId})

SELECT DISTINCT a.mfl_idx,a.or_id, a.mfl_st_date, a.mfl_manager, b.po_lotno, b.mp_qty, b.mp_prod_name, b.mp_texture, b.mp_thickness, b.mp_state, b.mp_standard FROM sm_mf_proc_log a JOIN sm_mf_proc b ON a.OR_ID = b.OR_ID WHERE b.MP_PR_STATE IN(1,3) AND a.or_id = #{orId}

SELECT DISTINCT a.mfl_idx, a.or_id, LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR, a.mfl_st_date, 120), 16) AS mfl_st_date, LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR, a.mfl_ed_date, 120), 16) AS mfl_ed_date, a.mfl_manager, a.mfl_work_time, b.po_lotno, b.mp_qty, b.mp_prod_name, b.mp_texture, b.mp_thickness, b.mp_state, b.mp_standard FROM sm_mf_proc_log a JOIN sm_mf_proc b ON a.OR_ID = b.OR_ID where mfl_idx = #{mflIdx}
SELECT mp_pr_state FROM sm_mf_proc WHERE or_id = #{orId}
SELECT * FROM sm_mf_proc WHERE mp_pr_state IN(1,3)
mapper.update: update sm_mf_proc_log set mfl_work_time = DATEDIFF(MINUTE, mfl_st_date, mfl_ed_date) where mfl_idx = #{mflIdx}
